document_data.mainbody:
he Order of the Fiery Heart was part of the standing army of the efreet in the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire.
This elite unit numbered 500 griffon-riding troops. Many of the members were efreet nobles, and even efreet priests or sorcerers.
The Order of the Fiery Heart was trusted with the most important missions for the Sultan.
They served a wide range of roles, depending on the mission. Great honors were bestowed upon members of this unit, up to and including marriage to one of the Sultans daughters.
The City of Brass served as the base of the Order of the Fiery Heart.
